experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: Arrow Electricals
workDescription: Engineered a headless front end for the e-commerce division using Vue.js and Nuxt.js, boosting page speed performance by 35% and elevating Google indexing rank by 40%

Led the migration from a Stencil framework front end to a headless system, ensuring a seamless transition with zero downtime and integrated BigCommerce's REST API to efficiently manage product and order data, enhancing the overall user experience.
Migrated over 15,000 products and 50,000 records to ElasticSearch, significantly improving search functionality and data retrieval times.
Set up server-side scripts to sync product data using both API calls and web scrapers.
Optimized Nginx server configurations, including setting up compression, route handling, and redirects to improve server performance and security.

experiences.title: Junior Developer
experiences.subtitle: Wipro
workDescription: Worked on the Web Development team where I got the opportunity to work on a variety of technologies like React, React Native, Node and Python
Was part of the team that created a system to migrate 15000+ mobile devices from Apple Airwatch to Microsoft Intune.
